title: Part A
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response includes neither or only one of the following criteria.
The response includes both of the following criteria.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not include any of the following reasonings.
The response includes one of the following reasonings.
